title: Not just the game, these cricket stadiums are a delight to watch
text: Not just the game, these cricket stadiums are a delight to watch March 23, 2017 10:51   10:51 IST Share Article March 23, 2017 10:51 IST Updated: With the inclusion of HPCA Stadium in Dharamsala as one of the Test playing venues, a look at some of the picturesque venues around the world. more-in Please Wait while comments are loading...
